talentList.name: Call of Flame
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems and Fire Nova by v0%, and damage done by your Lava Burst spell by v1%.

talentList.name: Call of Thunder
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Thunderstorm spells by an additional 5%.

talentList.name: Concussion
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Thunderstorm, Lava Burst and Shock spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Convection
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Burst, and Wind Shear spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Fury
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing and Magma Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Fire Nova
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire Nova by v0% and reduces the cooldown by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Elemental Mastery
talentList.description: When activated, your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Lava Burst spell becomes an instant cast spell. In addition, you gain 15% spell haste for 15 sec. Elemental Mastery shares a cooldown with Nature's Swiftness.

talentList.name: Elemental Focus
talentList.description: After landing a non-periodic critical strike with a Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell, you enter a Clearcasting state.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next 2 damage or healing spells by 40%.

talentList.name: Reverberation
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells and Wind Shear by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Lightning Mastery
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Lava Burst spells by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Elemental Warding
talentList.description: Reduces all damage taken by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Reach
talentList.description: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Fire Nova, and Lava Burst spells by v0 yards, increases the radius of your Thunderstorm spell by v1%, and increases the range of your Flame Shock by v2 yards.

talentList.name: Eye of the Storm
talentList.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Burst and Hex spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Devastation
talentList.description: Your non-periodic offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by v0% for 10 sec.

talentList.name: Unrelenting Storm
talentList.description: Regenerate mana equal to v0% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

talentList.name: Elemental Precision
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by v0% and reduces the threat caused by Fire, Frost and Nature spells by v1%.

talentList.name: Lightning Overload
talentList.description: Gives your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells a v0% chance to cast a second, similar spell on the same target at no additional cost that causes half damage and no threat.

talentList.name: Totem of Wrath
talentList.description: Summons a Totem of Wrath with 5 health at the feet of the caster.  The totem increases spell power by 100 for all party and raid members, and increases the critical strike chance of all attacks by 3% against all enemies within 40 yards.  Lasts 5 min.

talentList.name: Elemental Oath
talentList.description: While Clearcasting from Elemental Focus is active, you deal v0% more spell damage. In addition, party and raid members within 100 yards receive a v1% bonus to their spell critical strike chance.

talentList.name: Astral Shift
talentList.description: When stunned, feared or silenced you  shift into the Astral Plane reducing all damage taken by v0% for the duration of the stun, fear or silence effect.

talentList.name: Lava Flows
talentList.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Lava Burst spell by an additional v0%, and when your Flame Shock is dispelled your spell casting speed is increased by v1% for 6 sec.

talentList.name: Storm, Earth and Fire
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Chain Lightning spell by .v0 sec, your Earthbind Totem also has a v1% chance to root targets for 5 sec when cast and the periodic damage done by your Flame Shock is increased by v2%.

talentList.name: Thunderstorm
talentList.description: You call down a bolt of lightning, energizing you and damaging nearby enemies within 10 yards. Restores 8% mana to you and deals 551 to 629 Nature damage to all nearby enemies, knocking them back 20 yards. This spell is usable while stunned.

talentList.name: Shamanism
talentList.description: Your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells gain an additional v0% and your Lava Burst gains an additional v1% of your bonus damage effects.

talentList.name: Booming Echoes
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Flame Shock and Frost Shock spells by an additional v0 sec., and increases the direct damage done by your Flame Shock and Frost Shock spells by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Anticipation
talentList.description: Increases your chance to dodge by an additional v0%, and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by v1%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

talentList.name: Flurry
talentList.description: Increases your attack speed by v0% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

talentList.name: Improved Ghost Wolf
talentList.description: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Shields
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by v0%, increases the amount of mana gained from your Water Shield orbs by v1% and increases the amount of healing done by your Earth Shield orbs by v2%.

talentList.name: Guardian Totems
talentList.description: Increases the amount of armor increased by your Stoneskin Totem by v0% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by v1 sec.

talentList.name: Enhancing Totems
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Flametongue Totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Elemental Weapons
talentList.description: Increases the damage caused by your Windfury Weapon effect by v0%  increases the spell damage on your Flametongue Weapon by v1% and increases the bonus healing on your Earthliving Weapon by v2%.

talentList.name: Thundering Strikes
talentList.description: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by v0%.

talentList.name: Ancestral Knowledge
talentList.description: Increases your Intellect by v0%.

talentList.name: Toughness
talentList.description: Increases your Stamina by v0%, and reduces the duration of movement slowing effects on you by v1%.

talentList.name: Spirit Weapons
talentList.description: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks and reduces all threat generated by 30%.

talentList.name: Shamanistic Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock spells by 45%.

talentList.name: Stormstrike
talentList.description: Instantly attack with both weapons.  In addition, the next 4 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target from the Shaman are increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

talentList.name: Weapon Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by v0%.

talentList.name: Improved Windfury Totem
talentList.description: Increases the melee haste granted by your Windfury totem by v0%.

talentList.name: Unleashed Rage
talentList.description: Increases your expertise by v0, and increases all party and raid members' attack power by v1% while within 100 yards of the Shaman.

talentList.name: Dual Wield
talentList.description: Allows one-hand and off-hand weapons to be equipped in the off-hand.

talentList.name: Mental Quickness
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast Shaman spells by v0% and increases your spell power by an amount equal to v1% of your attack power.

talentList.name: Dual Wield Specialization
talentList.description: Increases your chance to hit while dual wielding by an additional v0%.

talentList.name: Shamanistic Rage
talentList.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and gives your successful melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana equal to 15% of your attack power. This spell is usable while stunned. Lasts 15 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Stormstrike
talentList.description: When you Stormstrike, you have a v0% chance to immediately grant you 20% of your base mana.

talentList.name: Static Shock
talentList.description: You have a v0% chance to hit your target with a Lightning Shield orb charge when you deal damage with melee attacks and abilities, and your Lightning Shield gains v1 additional charges.

talentList.name: Earthen Power
talentList.description: Your Earthbind Totem's pulses have a v0% chance to also remove all snare effects from you and nearby friendly targets, and your Earth Shock reduces enemy attack speed by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Maelstrom Weapon
talentList.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to reduce the cast time of your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lesser Healing Wave, Healing Wave, Chain Heal, or Hex spell by v0%. Stacks up to v1 times. Lasts v2 sec.

talentList.name: Feral Spirit
talentList.description: Summons two Spirit Wolves under the command of the Shaman, lasting 45 sec.

talentList.name: Mental Dexterity
talentList.description: Increases your Attack Power by v0% of your Intellect.

talentList.name: Earth's Grasp
talentList.description: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by v0% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by v1%, and reduces the cooldown of both totems by v2%.

talentList.name: Lava Lash
talentList.description: You charge your off-hand weapon with lava, instantly dealing 100% off-hand Weapon damage. Damage is increased by 25% if your off-hand weapon is enchanted with Flametongue.

talentList.name: Frozen Power
talentList.description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Lash and Shock spells by v0% on targets afflicted by your Frostbrand Attack effect, and your Frost Shock has a v1% chance to root the target in ice for 5 sec. when used on targets at or further than 15 yards from you.

talentList.name: Ancestral Healing
talentList.description: Reduces your target's physical damage taken by v0% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

talentList.name: Tidal Force
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave and Chain Heal by 60%. Each critical heal reduces the chance by 20%. Lasts 20 sec.

talentList.name: Improved Water Shield
talentList.description: You have a v0% chance to instantly gain mana as if you consumed a Water Shield Orb when you gain a critical effect from your Healing Wave or Riptide spells, a v1% chance when you gain a critical effect from your Lesser Healing Wave spell, and a v2% chance when you gain a critical effect from your Chain Heal spell.

talentList.name: Improved Healing Wave
talentList.description: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by v0 sec.

talentList.name: Healing Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting any Shaman healing spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Restorative Totems
talentList.description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring Totem by v0%, and increases the amount healed by your Healing Stream Totem by v1%.

talentList.name: Improved Reincarnation
talentList.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by v0 min and increases the amount of health and mana recovered when reincarnating by an additional v1%.

talentList.name: Mana Tide Totem
talentList.description: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 10% of the caster's health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 6% of total mana every 3 seconds to group members within 30 yards.

talentList.name: Nature's Swiftness
talentList.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell. Nature's Swiftness shares a cooldown with Elemental Mastery.

talentList.name: Purification
talentList.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Tidal Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your healing spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Tidal Mastery
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by v0%.

talentList.name: Totemic Focus
talentList.description: Reduces the mana cost of your totems by v0%.

talentList.name: Healing Grace
talentList.description: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by v0% and reduces the chance your helpful spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by v1%.

talentList.name: Healing Way
talentList.description: Increases the amount healed by your Healing Wave spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Focused Mind
talentList.description: Reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effects used against the Shaman by v0%. This effect does not stack with other similar effects.

talentList.name: Nature's Blessing
talentList.description: Increases your healing by an amount equal to v0% of your Intellect.

talentList.name: Improved Chain Heal
talentList.description: Increases the amount healed by your Chain Heal spell by v0%.

talentList.name: Earth Shield
talentList.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, reducing casting or channeling time lost when damaged by 30%  and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 150.  This effect can only occur once every few seconds.  6 charges.  Lasts 10 min.  Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.

talentList.name: Nature's Guardian
talentList.description: Whenever a damaging attack brings you below v00% health, your maximum health is increased by 3% for 10 sec and your threat level towards the attacker is reduced.  30 second cooldown.

talentList.name: Improved Earth Shield
talentList.description: Increases the amount of charges for your Earth Shield by v0, and increases the healing done by your Earth Shield by v1%.

talentList.name: Blessing of the Eternals
talentList.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your spells by v0%, and increases the chance to apply the Earthliving heal over time effect on the target by v1% when they are at or under 35% total health.

talentList.name: Ancestral Awakening
talentList.description: When you critically heal with your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave or Riptide you summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing the lowest percentage health friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for v0% of the amount healed.

talentList.name: Tidal Waves
talentList.description: When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you have a v0% chance to lower the cast time of your Healing Wave spell by 30% and increase the critical effect chance of your Lesser Healing Wave spell by v25%, until two such spells have been cast. In addition, your Healing Wave gains an additional v1% of your bonus healing effects and your Lesser Healing Wave gains an additional 2% of your bonus healing effects.

talentList.name: Riptide
talentList.description: Heals a friendly target for 639 to 691 and another 665 over 15 sec.  Your next Chain Heal cast on that primary target within 15 sec will consume the healing over time effect and increase the amount of the Chain Heal by 25%.

talentList.name: Cleanse Spirit
talentList.description: Cleanse the spirit of a friendly target, removing 1 poison effect, 1 disease effect, and 1 curse effect.

major.name: Glyph of Hex
major.description: Increases the damage your Hex target can take before the Hex effect is removed by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Fire Elemental Totem
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Elemental Totem by 5 min.

major.name: Glyph of Lava
major.description: Your Lava Burst spell gains an additional 10% of your spellpower.

major.name: Glyph of Feral Spirit
major.description: Your spirit wolves gain an additional 30% of your attack power.

major.name: Glyph of Thunder
major.description: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by 10 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Riptide
major.description: Increases the duration of Riptide by 6 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Elemental Mastery
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Elemental Mastery ability by 30 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Totem of Wrath
major.description: When you cast Totem of Wrath, you gain 30% of the totem's bonus spell power for 5 min.

major.name: Glyph of Earth Shield
major.description: Increases the amount healed by your Earth Shield by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Stormstrike
major.description: Increases the Nature damage bonus from your Stormstrike ability by an additional 8%.

major.name: Glyph of Chain Heal
major.description: Your Chain Heal heals 1 additional target.

major.name: Glyph of Mana Tide Totem
major.description: Your Mana Tide Totem grants an additional 1% of each target's maximum mana each time it pulses.

major.name: Glyph of Chain Lightning
major.description: Your Chain Lightning strikes 1 additional target.

major.name: Glyph of Earthliving Weapon
major.description: Increases the chance for your Earthliving weapon to trigger by 5%.

major.name: Glyph of Windfury Weapon
major.description: Increases the chance per swing for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 2%.

major.name: Glyph of Water Mastery
major.description: Increases the passive mana regeneration of your Water Shield spell by 30%.

major.name: Glyph of Lesser Healing Wave
major.description: Your Lesser Healing Wave heals for 20% more if the target is also affected by Earth Shield.

major.name: Glyph of Healing Stream Totem
major.description: Your Healing Stream Totem heals for an additional 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Frost Shock
major.description: Increases the duration of your Frost Shock by 2 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Stoneclaw Totem
major.description: Your Stoneclaw Totem also places a damage absorb shield on you, equal to 4 times the strength of the shield it places on your totems.

major.name: Glyph of Fire Nova
major.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Nova spell by 3 seconds.

major.name: Glyph of Flametongue Weapon
major.description: Increases your spell critical strike chance by 2% on each of your weapons with Flametongue Weapon active.

major.name: Glyph of Flame Shock
major.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Flame Shock damage by 60%.

major.name: Glyph of Lava Lash
major.description: Damage on your Lava Lash is increased by an additional 10% if your weapon is enchanted with Flametongue.

major.name: Glyph of Lightning Shield
major.description: Increases the damage from Lightning Shield by 20%.

major.name: Glyph of Shocking
major.description: Reduces your global cooldown when casting your shock spells by 0.5 sec.

major.name: Glyph of Lightning Bolt
major.description: Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Bolt by 4%.

major.name: Glyph of Healing Wave
major.description: Your Healing Wave also heals you for 20% of the healing effect when you heal someone else.

minor.name: Glyph of Thunderstorm
minor.description: Increases the mana you receive from your Thunderstorm spell by 2%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.

minor.name: Glyph of Renewed Life
minor.description: Your Reincarnation spell no longer requires a reagent.

minor.name: Glyph of Astral Recall
minor.description: Cooldown of your Astral Recall spell reduced by 7.5 min.

minor.name: Glyph of Water Walking
minor.description: Your Water Walking spell no longer requires a reagent.

minor.name: Glyph of Water Breathing
minor.description: Your Water Breathing spell no longer requires a reagent.

minor.name: Glyph of Water Shield
minor.description: Increases the number of charges on your Water Shield spell by 1.

minor.name: Glyph of Ghost Wolf
minor.description: Your Ghost Wolf form regenerates an additional 1% of your maximum health every 5 sec.
